data.name: SendMessage
data.description: Sends a message through the WebSocket connection.
data.input_example: codebolt.chat.sendMessage("Hello, CodeBolt!", { source: 'script', timestamp: new Date().toISOString() });
data.input_variable_description: The `message` parameter is required and contains the text to send. The `payload` parameter is optional and can contain additional data to accompany the message.

### Response Structure

This method returns `void` and does not provide a response. The message is sent immediately when the method is called.
